kinetic.client.advanced

Class AdvancedKineticClientFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • kinetic.client.advanced.AdvancedKineticClientFactory

  • public class AdvancedKineticClientFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Kinetic advanced client boot-strap interface. This is the starting point for the advanced Kinetic applications.

    This factory class provides a static factory method to construct new instances of AdvancedKineticClient.

    Kinetic applications construct a new instance of ClientConfiguration and set appropriate configurations (such as server host/port) to the configuration instance. Applications then invoke the static createInstance method to obtain a new instance of AdvancedKineticClient.

    Author:
    Chiaming Yang
    See Also:
    AdvancedKineticClient, ClientConfiguration

        Construct a new instance of the AdvancedKineticClient.
